title: Disable Yasuo.
body:
Can we please disable yasuo until he is reworked or somehow changed?
HE IS IN EVERY NORMAL GAME.
HE IS BANNED IN EVERY RANKED GAME.

replies.body: I remember this thread. From yesterday.

I hate to give people tips on Champions that I'm in the mind of playing, but, if you ever have to go up against a Yasuo, play Vladimir.

_Transfusion_ ignores _Wind Wall_.

Yasuo doesn't need disabled, y'all just need to learn ways to fight him.

Fuck off, nobody's gonna pick shit that counters yasuo in blind queue just in case you have to face him. I play Ziggs and I'm fucking tired of seeing that wall cock block my combos with minimum effort. Even though I usually win against them it's still fucking lame to wait for your jungler to lock him down or for his annoying ass wall to be down for like 10 seconds.

His wall has a 24 second CD to start and Yasuo never builds significant CDR. His kit is made to excel against skillshot-reliant champs, but that doesn't mean there aren't Windows of vulnerability for you to exploit.

I have cooldowns too, when I waste my shit trying to hit him and he blocks it, you may as well erase a good 10 seconds off his wall's cd. The only thing I can do is just fucking farm the whole early game and roam bot if I can. And again, I'm not gonna change the champs I like to play just cause I have to face a fuckin yasuo

He's popular.
He's annoying to play against.
But he's decently balanced.
As you said, a lot of people enjoy playing yasuo. So why disable him?
Actually since the new 10 ban phase, he is banned every single game - usually 2x. He needs to be disabled and reworked.
